pc_day_trlang.name: username
pc_day_trlang.description: Learner's username on the edX platform

pc_day_trlang.name: course_id
pc_day_trlang.description: course ID in the standard format as org/number/semester

pc_day_trlang.name: date
pc_day_trlang.description: The date for which the transcript download analytics are computed.

pc_day_trlang.name: last_time
pc_day_trlang.description: The last timestamp when the learner would have triggered a transcript download event

pc_day_trlang.name: resource
pc_day_trlang.description: The resource whose transcript is downloaded

pc_day_trlang.name: resource_event_data
pc_day_trlang.description: The tracking log event data associated with a given resource

pc_day_trlang.name: resource_event_type
pc_day_trlang.description: The tracking event type associated with the record

pc_day_trlang.name: langcount
pc_day_trlang.description: The number of times a transcript download is requested in a given language

description: Table generated with SQL query file pc_day_trlang.sql using the simeon CLI tool. It tracks daily transcript downloads and the languages associated with those transcripts.
